column5: Well I got out again yesterday to the parents and went for the carp again. I had the line in the water around 2:30 and by 3pm I had a fish on I knew it was a good one to as it nearly took all my line off the spool in the first run, I managed to keep it in before getting to the end of my line thank god. Well after that he didn't fight to good so I was sure how big he was until I got him near shore and then again there he goes not the whole line but a good amount after that fight he was tired out I think and came in fairly easy but it was a monster(at least to me). I have been carp fishing two times and this being the second in the 2 days of targeting them I have landed my PB carp lol, not only is he my personal best but the biggest fish I have ever caught. Got the heart going really good but well worth it in my eyes.  Heres a pic of the monster that was 37.5 inches long and 28.13 lbs.    That doesn't really show the true size of the fish so here is another 2 pictures.      All in all it was a slower day then the first that being the only one I caught, I had 3 on one snapped the line on the leader and the other just got off. I know they are Ugly looking and invasive but well worth fishing for them they give a darn good fight. Hope I will have a bigger one and some more pics soon.  Chris.
Now that's SWEET Go Team #10 Size Matters SBK
Now thats a hunk of Carp good deal.   Art
Lol yea I was pretty excited over it I think my neighbors are all wondering whats team 10 lol. By far my biggest fish caught.
Way to go, Chris. A monster fish. People fly in from all over the world to find carp that size. Good for you!
Please don't show them the secret handshake.
Thanks alot Roy. Best feeling in the world fighting something this size. First time in a awhile I was happy feeling my heart beat that hard lol.
what a monster, nice job!
Holy SOW !
lol thanks guys.  Chris
Nice fish, Chris. Not just big, but nicely proportioned too. Congrats!
Huge head on that bugger. Nice fish!!!!
holy smoke chris, that is one huge carp... that would be hard to beat by other teams... yaaahoooo!!!!!  lol way to go bud...  I check the 2010 tourney, their best was 36"  U know want that means?...
Huge carp! Congrats on the PB. I have a feeling you'll have more PBs to come at the rate you're going.  I hope to get my hands on a couple of those myself eventually

Congrats, thats musta been a great fight!  I hear you on the excitement, when it's on and starts peeling line it's the best feeling in the world (almost).  Great fish, I'd be happier for you if it was team 9, lol.  Must be the loafers, I'm going to get some today
Not bad for your second time out What a hog Excellent job Chris   Congrats Leechman
Alright! What a beast. Congratulations on your new PB. That is pretty good for only your second time carp angling. I think the carp are in trouble. And so are you   . Now you will be after a 30 lb'r.
Thanks everyone. I am going to try and get some more tonight and hopefully a 30+ pounder lol we will see.
Wikipedia just changed the link for "images of carp" to your picture here on OFC  As far as carp go...thats a beaut  Nice shootin!!!
She's a beaut!!!!,,,,
Excellent fish, well shot. Just think .. .. .   double the power once the water warms up!
I can't wait they fight good right now I can't imagine what it would do then.
